fiveWhys.title: Horar da Tunani mai Muhimmanci ta Me Yasa 5
fiveWhys.description: ∆òara inganta ∆ôwarewarku ta aikin nazari ta hanyar bincika ∆ôalubalen koyo a hanyar tsari

lookBeyondSurface.title: Duba Fiye da Fuskanci
lookBeyondSurface.description: Kada ka kar…ìi amsar farko. Tona cikin neman dalilai na zahiri.
lookBeyondSurface.example: A maimakon 'Ba ni da damar lissafi', tambaya 'Wane …ìangare ne na lissafi ake wahalar da ni?'

questionAssumptions.title: Tambayar Hasashe
questionAssumptions.description: Ka ∆ôarfafa abin da kake tunanin ka sani. Hasashenka daidai ne?
questionAssumptions.example: Shin matsalar ita ce hanyar koyarwa, ko kuma ina bu∆ôatar wasu gabatarwa da daban?

multipleViews.title: Duba Hanyoyi Daban-daban
multipleViews.description: Duba matsalar daga hanyoyi daban-daban da ra'ayoyi.
multipleViews.example: Ta yaya malami, abokai, ko gwani za su dubi wannan ∆ôalubalen koyo?

rootCauses.title: Mayar da Hankali kan Tushen Dalilan
rootCauses.description: Gano abin da ke haifar da matsalar, ba kawai alamu ba.
rootCauses.example: ∆òarancin ∆ôima alama ce. Wane al'ada ko nakasun koyo ke haifar da su?

connections.title: Yin Ha…óin Kai
connections.description: Ha…óa wannan matsalar da tsarin koyo na gaba …óaya.
connections.example: Shin wannan yana da ala∆ôa da yadda nake fuskantar sauran fannoni ko ∆ôwarewa?

step.focus: Mayar da hankali kan ∆ôir∆ôirar tambayar "me yasa" mai inganci wadda ke tona tushen dalili.

step.questionTip: Mayar da hankali kan tambayar daidai. Za a samar da amsa ta atomatik don taimaka maka koyo.

tips.start: Fara da "Me yasa" don mayar da hankali kan dalilai, ba alamu ba
tips.specific: Ka zama mai ∆ôayatarwa ba mai yaudara ba a tambayoyin ku
tips.challenge: ∆òarfafa hasashe da ke cikin amsa da ta gabata
tips.systemic: Nemi dalilan da suka shafi tsari ko ha…óuwa
tips.perspectives: Duba ra'ayoyi daban-daban game da matsalar

fiveWhys.title: Horar da Tunani mai Muhimmanci ta Me Yasa 5
fiveWhys.description: ∆òara inganta ∆ôwarewarku ta aikin nazari ta hanyar bincika ∆ôalubalen koyo a hanyar tsari

defineProblem.title: Bayyana Matsalar Koyo
defineProblem.guidance: A bayyana kalubalen koyo da kuke fuskanta. Ku zama masu ∆ôayatarwa kuma ku guji bayani mai yaudara.
prompts: Yaushe ne wannan matsalar take faruwa?
Ta yaya wannan take shafar burin koyo naku?
defineProblem.criticalThinking: Tunani mai zurfi na farawa da haske. Matsala mai bayani da kyau tana da rabin magani.

firstWhy.title: Me Yasa na Farko - Dalili na Zahiri
firstWhy.guidance: Tambaya me yasa wannan matsalar koyo take kasancewa. Mayar da hankali kan dalili na zahiri.
prompts: Mene ne dalili na zahiri na wannan wahala?
Mene ne yake faruwa kafin ku fuskanci wannan matsala?
Mene ne yake sa wannan batu ya zama mai wahala?
firstWhy.criticalThinking: Nemi amsoshi da ke bisa shaida, ba hasashe ko ji ba.

secondWhy.title: Me Yasa na Biyu - Nazari mai Zurfi
secondWhy.guidance: Yanzu tambaya me yasa dalili na farko yake kasancewa. Fara tona dalilan da ke cikin ∆ôasa.
prompts: Me yasa wannan dalili na farko yake faruwa?
Wane hali ke haifar da wannan matsala?
Mene ne ke rasa da zai hana wannan dalili?
secondWhy.criticalThinking: Tambaya ko amsar ku ta farko cikakkiya ce. Akwai dalilan da ke …ìoye?

thirdWhy.title: Me Yasa na Uku - Matakin Tsari
thirdWhy.guidance: Bincika tsari, ayyuka, ko salon da ke haifar da dalilan da ke zurfi.
prompts: Me yasa wa…óannan halayen suke kasancewa a yanayin koyo naku?
Wane salon ko al'ada ke taimaka wajen wannan?
Ta yaya abubuwan waje ke shafar wannan hali?
thirdWhy.criticalThinking: Tunani game da tsari. Ta yaya daban-daban suke ha…óa waje guda don haifar da wannan matsala?

fourthWhy.title: Me Yasa na Hu…óu - Dalilan Asali
fourthWhy.guidance: Duba ∆ôwarewar asali, raguwar sani, ko matsalolin ha…óuwa.
prompts: Me yasa wa…óannan salolin suke ci gaba?
Wane ∆ôwarewar asali ko sani ke rasa?
Mene ne ya kamata ya canza don hana wannan matsala?
fourthWhy.criticalThinking: Duba salon dogon lokaci da tushen abubuwa.

fifthWhy.title: Me Yasa na Biyar - Tushen Dalili
fifthWhy.guidance: Gano dalili mafi zurfi, mafi muhimmanci da, idan an magance, zai warware matsalar.
prompts: Me yasa wa…óannan matsalolin asali suke kasancewa?
Mene ne tushen wannan kalubalen koyo?
Idan za ku iya canza abu guda don magance wannan, mene ne zai kasance?
fifthWhy.criticalThinking: Tushen dalili ya kamata ya zama abin da za a yi aiki, kuma a cikin ∆ôarfin ku.

notFound.title: Ba a Sami Shafin ba
notFound.description: Kai! Shafin da kake nema baya kasancewa ko an matsar da shi.
notFound.helpText: Kuna bu∆ôatar taimako? Gwada neman batun da kake son koyo a shafin bincike.

educationalFacts: Yan Adam suna koyo kusan 70% daga ∆ôwarewar aiki, 20% daga wasu, da 10% daga littattafai.
Karatu da murya mai ∆ôarfi yana ∆ôara iya tunawa zuwa 15%.
∆òwayoyin mu na iya adana wajen baiti 2.5 na bayani.
Barci bayan koyo yana inganta tunawar bayanai zuwa 30%.
Koyar da wasu ita ce mafi kyau don fahimtar batu.
Rubutu da hannu yana ∆ôara fahimta fiye da bugawa.
Koyo na minti 30-50 tare da hutu yana da tasiri fiye da koyo na dogon lokaci.
Amfani da launuka daban-daban lokacin rubutu yana ∆ôara tunawar abubuwa zuwa 25%.
Koyo a wuri guda kowace rana yana taimakawa ∆ôwa∆ôwalwa gane lokacin koyo ne.
Shiga koyo da tunani yana inganta iya tunawa na dogon lokaci.
Tafiya na minti 20 tana ∆ôara ∆ôwarewar ∆ôir∆ôira da tunani.
Maimaita bayani a lokuta na musamman (maimaita tare da tazara) yana da tasiri don tunawa.
Taswirar tunani tana taimakawa wajen shirya ra'ayoyi da inganta fahimta.
Kasancewa da ruwa a jiki yana da muhimmanci domin ∆ôarancin ruwa yana rage iya mayar da hankali.
Ha…óa sabon bayani da ilimin da ke akwai yana ∆ôarfafa tunani.
Koyo ta hanyoyi daban-daban (gani, ji, motsi) yana taimakawa wajen ∆ôara fahimta.
Gwajin koyo mafi tasiri ne don gano yadda aka fahimta fiye da sake karatu.
Koyo tare da ∆ôungiya yana iya inganta ci gaban koyo.

qa.greeting: Hello! I'm ready to help you understand more about "{{topic}}". Please ask any question!
qa.simulatedResponse: Based on the topic "{{topic}}", here's an explanation for your question: "{question}". This is a simulated response that would be replaced by real AI.

fiveWhys.title: 5 Whys Critical Thinking Trainer
fiveWhys.description: Develop your analytical skills by systematically examining learning challenges

summary.title: Analysis Complete!
summary.description: You've successfully applied critical thinking to understand your learning challenge
summary.question: Question #{number}

lookBeyond.title: Look Beyond the Surface
lookBeyond.description: Don't accept the first answer. Dig deeper to find underlying causes.
lookBeyond.example: Instead of 'I'm bad at math', ask 'What specific math concepts am I struggling with?'

questionAssumptions.title: Question Assumptions
questionAssumptions.description: Challenge what you think you know. Are your assumptions correct?
questionAssumptions.example: Is the teaching method the problem, or do I need different prerequisites?

multipleViews.title: Consider Multiple Perspectives
multipleViews.description: Look at the problem from different angles and viewpoints.
multipleViews.example: How would a teacher, peer, or expert view this learning challenge?

rootCauses.title: Focus on Root Causes
rootCauses.description: Identify what's really causing the issue, not just symptoms.
rootCauses.example: Poor grades are a symptom. What learning habits or gaps cause them?

connections.title: Make Connections
connections.description: Link this problem to broader patterns in your learning.
connections.example: Does this connect to how I approach other subjects or skills?

intro.textarea: Describe a specific learning challenge you're facing...

1.title: Define the Learning Problem
1.guidance: Clearly state what specific learning challenge you're facing. Be precise and avoid vague statements.

prompts.0: What exactly are you struggling to understand?
prompts.1: When does this problem occur most?
prompts.2: How does this affect your learning goals?

1.criticalThinking: Critical thinking starts with clarity. A well-defined problem is half solved.

2.title: First Why - Immediate Cause
2.guidance: Ask why this learning problem exists. Focus on the most direct, observable cause.

prompts.0: What is the immediate reason for this difficulty?
prompts.1: What happens right before you encounter this problem?
prompts.2: What makes this topic particularly challenging?

2.criticalThinking: Look for evidence-based answers, not assumptions or emotions.

3.title: Second Why - Deeper Analysis
3.guidance: Now ask why that first cause exists. Start digging into underlying factors.

prompts.0: Why does that immediate cause happen?
prompts.2: What's missing that would prevent this cause?

3.criticalThinking: Question whether your first answer is complete. Are there hidden factors?

4.title: Third Why - System Level
4.guidance: Examine the systems, processes, or patterns that create the deeper causes.

prompts.0: Why do these conditions exist in your learning environment?
prompts.1: What patterns or habits contribute to this?
prompts.2: How do external factors influence this situation?

4.criticalThinking: Think systemically. How do different elements interact to create this problem?

5.title: Fourth Why - Fundamental Factors
5.guidance: Look at fundamental skills, knowledge gaps, or structural issues.

prompts.1: What fundamental skills or knowledge are missing?
prompts.2: What would need to change to prevent this problem?

5.criticalThinking: Consider long-term patterns and foundational elements.

6.title: Fifth Why - Root Cause
6.guidance: Identify the deepest, most fundamental cause that, if addressed, would solve the problem.

prompts.0: Why do these fundamental issues exist?
prompts.1: What's the ultimate root of this learning challenge?
prompts.2: If you could change one thing to solve this, what would it be?

6.criticalThinking: The root cause should be actionable and within your power to influence.

step.focus: Focus on crafting a precise "why" question that digs deeper into the root cause.
step.formulate: Formulate a 'Why' question about this learning problem:
step.formulateNext: Formulate the next 'Why' question based on: "{previous}"
step.writeQuestion: Write a specific 'why' question that will help uncover deeper causes...
step.questionTip: Focus on asking the right question. The answer will be generated automatically to help your learning.

tips.start: Start with "Why" to focus on causes, not symptoms
tips.specific: Be specific rather than vague in your questioning
tips.challenge: Challenge assumptions in your previous answer
tips.systemic: Look for systemic or structural causes
tips.perspectives: Consider multiple perspectives on the problem
